doc:
Pamela Britton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pamela_Britton 0 Pamela Britton (born Armilda Jane Owen, March 19, 1923 – June 17, 1974) was an American actress best known for appearing as Lorelei Brown in the television series My Favorite Martian (1963–1966). Throughout her acting career, Britton appeared often on Broadway and in several Hollywood and TV movies. She starred in the film noir classic D.O.A. in 1950. Pamela_Britton ( born Armilda_Jane_Owen , March_19_,_1923 – June_17_,_1974 ) was an_American_actress best_known for appearing as Lorelei_Brown in the_television_series_My_Favorite_Martian ( 1963 – 1966 ) . Throughout her_acting_career , Britton appeared often on Broadway and in several_Hollywood_and_TV_movies . She starred in the_film_noir_classic_D.O.A. in 1950 .
